name: Queenstown's Detective
description:
DEMO consists of prologue + the first half of chapter 1

With years of experience as a Detective in the Queenstown’s Police Department, the same city you were born and raised into, you now have to face a very gruesome serial murder investigation. Things were not complicated enough, however, because your only parent got in the way once again. So now you’ll have to not only solve a crime but do it quickly, before Unit Foxtrot destroys all your work just to hide all traces of supernatural - except that you’ve known about it for a long time.

The Agency might not like it, but Queenstown is yours now.

  • Customise your gender, appearance and sexuality (MC is also canonically demiromantic).
  • Protect the city.
  • Trust no one.
  • Romance one out of four gender selectable ROs, the mysterious members of the Foxtrot Unit.
  • Play as a highly intelligent person with a natural talent for investigation.
  • Deal with a past mistake in the form of a very invasive ex fiancée.
Vance

[Gender Customisable]    

The leader of Unit Foxtrot. A cutting, serious person with a cold demeanor, not ready to spare anyone’s feeling if they’re in the right. They have hidden their gentler side for so long, now, that they themselves are unsure if something of it still remains.

Mischa

[Gender Customisable]    

A docile and introverted person, very formal with people they don’t know. They might need a lot of time to trust someone, but once they do Mischa will let loose their sweet, most adorable side. There’s something lurking, though, behind their shy smiles and it resembles fear.

Bea (Beau/Beatrice)

[Gender Customisable]  

A controlled and seemingly patronising person, always ready to cut their opponents down with a smile and a heartless remark. They might hide a more caring side but be careful because they are quick to turn their back on someone if they’re not up to their standards.

Sierra

[Gender Customisable]    

A selfless and empathetic person, for most of the time they are respectful and kind-hearted. They feel every emotion intensely, though, including sadness and anger so you’ll need to be careful around them.

The unlockable RO Ariel (the ex-fiancée)

[Gender customizable]

You love them and hate them because they think they own you and you’re deadly afraid that it’s true. They are protective, possessive and they make your heart ache, for better or for worse. Will you get back into their arms?

Other Characters of Interest

Rogue (your only remaining parent): they have been absent for most of your life, so much so that even when they’re with you they feel distant. Maybe you resent them, maybe you just crave their approval.
